Description: Fragment of wall and offset of lip of Attic black-glazed pottery cup, type C. Wholly glazed. Incised inscription on inside.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 97)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 704, no. 620)
Höckmann & Möller 2006 / The Hellenion at Naukratis: Questions and Observations (p. 14 fig. 7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1719)
